props.active: When undefined (default), the component utilizes its default variant, otherwise it will use the activeVariant if active is true, or the baseVariant if active is false.
props.activeIcon: When active is a boolean, this icon is used when active is true.
props.activeVariant: When active is a boolean, this variant is used when active is true.
props.baseVariant: When active is a boolean, this variant is used when active is false.
props.hideOverlay: Hides overlay from being displayed when active or focused.
props.iconColor: Explicit color applied to the icon.
props.iconSizes: An array of tuples that define the icon sizes for each named size.
props.rotate: The rotation of the icon in degrees.
props.sizes: An array of tuples that define the button sizes for each named size.
